note:
Hey howdy there! I'm a generally positive introvert who is interested in trying ten thousand things and could use some clones to get them done... but they'd probably just form a book club instead of take over the world.

I'm a pretty simple person in real life (it's my head that's full of funky, weird chaos) and am a practicing writer that aspires to make a living at home (while cultivating my own garden and getting really good at cooking and other self-sustaining living tasks). As long as I have my coffee, pets, books, movies, instruments, and my SNES and N64 around... life is generally better than "meh".
